history.proof: intros h st client id c. unfold update_elections_data_client_request. hauto q: on depth: 3use: snd, log, handleClientRequest, length.

ctx: intros h st client id c.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (length (log (snd st)) <? length (log (handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c))) eqn:Hlen.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface h : name st : electionsData * raft_data client : clientId id : nat c : input The term "handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c" has type "(list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg))%type" while it is expected to have type "RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output".

ctx: intros h st client id c.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (log (handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c)) as [|e _] eqn:Heq; simpl.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface h : name st : electionsData * raft_data client : clientId id : nat c : input The term "handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c" has type "(list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg))%type" while it is expected to have type "RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output".

ctx: intros h st client id c.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface h : name st : electionsData * raft_data client : clientId id : nat c : input Unable to unify "votesWithLog (fst st)" with "votesWithLog (let '(_, st', _) := handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c in if length (log (snd st)) <? length (log st') then match log st' with | [] => fst st | e :: _ => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := (currentTerm st', e) :: allEntries (fst st) |} end else fst st)".

original: intros h st client id c. unfold update_elections_data_client_request. simpl. destruct (length (log (snd st)) <? length (log (handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c))) eqn:Hlen. - destruct (log (handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c)) as [|e _] eqn:Heq; simpl. + reflexivity. + rewrite Heq. reflexivity. - reflexivity.
